basics.name: Mahesh Shivanna
basics.label: Javascript Programmer
basics.summary: 6+ years of experience as a software engineer and majorly worked on Javascript

work.summary: Working in AfterNow is tremendous. We use technologies like AR/VR/MR, IOT, Javascript frameworks. Currently we are working for top established names like Microsoft, Hyperloop, Yogaglo.
highlights: Implemented adaptive streaming into the video player and wrote script to transcode videos
Solved many technical issues and improved performance of the application

work.summary: It is a service based startup with good working environment. We did both web and mobile applications using open source languages like PHP, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, NODE.JS, Phonegap etc.. It's now closed due to some management conflicts.
highlights: Worked as an full stack developer , involved in end to end application development
Lent a hand in other projects for writing procedures, fixing backend and front end issues

volunteer.summary: Yoga teacher-training is an online platform to teach yoga for those who want to become yoga teachers, for all devices. Worked on integrating cuepoints, markers to the video player, file-upload, discussion, assignment, quiz, dashboard etc.
highlights: Worked from scratch, fixed many performance issues.

volunteer.summary: Grievances is an e-governance mobile project mainly deals with reporting and resolving grievances in Users locality. It is map based application where user can upvote and share the grievance. Currently it is in beta stage.
highlights: Worked from scratch. Used React-Native, HAPIJS.
Did 80% of the work from DB design to app development

volunteer.summary: FendMe is an chat application for android, ios, windows devices. I was involved in the complete application development.
highlights: It is an hybrib mobile app. Technology used for this app Phonegap, Jquery-Mobile, MySql, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, PHP
Worked mainly on the DB and PHP

volunteer.summary: Issue tracking system is an internal e-governance issue tracking application for Nemmadi kiosks. Worked on designing database, UI templates etc. Helped in solving UI issues .
highlights: Technologies used for this application Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, My-SQL, PHP, jQuery
Worked on DB and front end

references.name: Santhosh Vittal
references.reference: Known Mahesh as a colleague for 6+ years and worked with him on number of projects, so i would i consider myself a good candidate to recommend him. Never seen him refuse help to anyone, hard-worker, driven, and gets the job done . Uplifts a team with his jovial and easy going attitude. I would highly recommend him and comes as a useful asset.
